Description:
To be successful you will need to meet the following:Must have proven experience in sales and territory management within the Healthcare industry in the Middle East region.
In-depth knowledge of medical equipment products and business.
Extensive knowledge and contacts within the Healthcare sector in the MEA region.
Demonstrated consultative skills in regions such as Egypt, North, and East Africa
Excellent verbal and communication skills in Arabic and English.
Applicants should be available for face-to-face interviews in the location mentioned above.Job Details
